lead_paragraph: The NCAA Division I Board of Directors scrapped a proposed ban on satellite camps Thursday, rebuffing a request from powerhouse conferences in the South and clearing the way for coaches to hold and work at clinics far from their campuses this summer.

headline.print_headline: NCAA Scraps Ban on Satellite Camps; Recruiting Under Study
headline.main: NCAA Scraps Ban on Satellite Camps; Recruiting Under Study
